divs: Sighting DetailsOn October 1, 2008 at 10:09AM I recorded an object in the sky with an infrared camera. I set up this infrared camera after witnessing a V shaped object at night with my night vision scope. The object in this video resembles objects I have seen in some NASA footage where infrared cameras were used.
